default.title: Application error.
default.description: Oh sorry, bud. Looks like I managed to break her, eh?

range.description: Looks like you lost your way there, bud. How's about you mosey on over to the home page and get yourself reacquainted with that there search bar, eh?

specific.title: Server-side error occured.
specific.description: Whoa there, bud! Looks like she broke when we tried to really give 'er, eh?
